reviewText:
From Detroit to Louisville, Seattle to Peoria...tens of thousands of people have attended Mary Hunt's Debt-Proof Living Seminar. Now you can be part of this exciting event too. The seminar comes to life in the comfort of your living room through this complete and uncut 3-hour video.

Join the audience in Redmond, WA as Mary inspires, motivates and delivers the information you need to take control of your finances, get out of debt, spend less money and enjoy life more. Mary will empower you to effectively manage and maximize your present income using the Contingency Fund, Rapid Debt-Repayment Plan, and Freedom Account.

Spend three hours with Mary Hunt and you financial life may never be the same!
